name: Let it Grow (GmanoftheGWN, James D, Sa1zzz, liaojuch, MrStephen120)
name_original: Let it Grow (GmanoftheGWN, James D, Sa1zzz, liaojuch, MrStephen120)
description:
Let it Grow is a 2D pipe-building, turn-based, wave survival game. In Let it Grow, the player must defend a crop from wild-life (Bugs and Animals) by growing roots underground. Players must grow roots underground to gain resources. Players can use said resources to upgrade their crops defenses or abilities. To win, the player must defend the crop for 40 days. How to play: - Grow roots underground to gain resources (Water, Minerals, and Stability). - When the player grows a root, it uses an action point (AP). - When the player is out of AP, use the 'End Day' button to end your turn. - Use the shop to use water and minerals to gain health and shields. - Use the perk tree to upgrade your crop's HP, AP, and defenses from specific types of wildlife. - Survive the 40 days.

GGJ 2023: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/let-it-grow-5
